title: Fearing death, Covid-19 patients in Mexico cross the border
description: CNN's Matt Rivers reports from Tijuana along the US-Mexico border. Baja California is one of the regions in Mexico hit hardest by the pandemic.

title: Trump's admission angers ex-GOP lawmaker: 'My blood boils'
description: President Trump told Axios he did not bring up reported US intelligence that Russians put bounties on US troops when speaking with Vladimir Putin.

title: Leading medical association warns of hundreds of thousands more deaths without decisive action
description: The United States on Wednesday surpassed 150,000 recorded Covid-19 deaths -- a milestone that comes as the country's rate of daily coronavirus deaths is the highest it's been since the spring.

title: US given dire warning as Covid-19 death toll passes 150,000
Mom breaks down after meeting man who saved her son's life
description: Emotional video shows the moment a mother meets the man who saved her son from a burning car. CNN affiliate KMOV has the story.

title: The art world has a money laundering problem
description: Shell companies with hidden owners. Middlemen who shield the identities of buyers and sellers. Inadequate safeguards to keep out shady money.

title: NYPD under fire after videos show woman being pulled into unmarked van during arrest
description: The New York City Police Department responded to a social media video that shows a woman being taken into custody Tuesday, saying she was wanted in connection with multiple instances of damage to police property.

title: Video shows train derailment in Arizona
description: One person was treated for smoke inhalation after a Union Pacific train derailed and caught fire on a bridge over Tempe Town Lake in Arizona, officials said.

title: Lawmakers push toxic disinfectant as Covid-19 treatment in Bolivia, against Health Ministry's warnings
description: The US and Brazil aren't the only countries where political leaders have appeared to contradict the advice of medical experts.

title: US to withdraw nearly 12,000 troops from Germany in move that will cost billions and take years
description: The US is to withdraw nearly 12,000 troops from Germany in a move that has attracted bipartisan congressional opposition and roiled key allies who see the move as a blow to NATO.

title: Zimbabwe signs $3.5 billion deal to compensate white farmers
description: Zimbabwe's government signed an agreement Wednesday worth $3.5 billion to compensate white farmers who were evicted from their land during a controversial and often violent land redistribution program in the early 2000s under former President Robert Mugabe.

title: She broke a hip, underwent surgeries, caught Covid-19. This 80-year-old woman laughed it all off
description: Eighty-year-old New Yorker Judith Hunt went to the hospital on January 31 after falling and breaking a femur and hip.

title: We watched Zac Efron's new Netflix show so you don't have to
description: Binge-watching Netflix's "Down to Earth with Zac Efron" is sort of like watching Bill and Ted discover climate change.

title: Colorado health officials investigate ketamine use in police-custody death of Elijah McClain
description: Colorado's health department has launched an investigation into the use of ketamine in connection with the 2019 death of Elijah McClain in police custody.

title: Deal reached on withdrawing federal agents from Portland
description: The Trump administration has reached an agreement with Oregon's Democratic governor to withdraw federal officers from downtown Portland, though the Department of Homeland Security says it will maintain a presence in the city for the time being.

title: UK government invests in sex party startup
description: The British government is investing £170,000 ($221,780) in a company that throws sex parties.

title: NBA star claims coronavirus 'is being used for population control'
description: Denver Nuggets forward Michael Porter Jr. said during a Q&A session on Snapchat Tuesday that the coronavirus pandemic "is being used for population control" after a user asked him if the virus was being overblown to scare people into being controlled.

title: Andy Cohen said he has 'robust' Covid-19 antibodies but can't donate plasma because he's gay
description: TV host Andy Cohen said he's disappointed that -- even though he's tested positive for "robust" Covid-19 antibodies -- he isn't allowed to potentially help coronavirus patients by donating plasma because he's a gay man.

title: Simple Alzheimer's blood test moves closer to reality
description: A simple blood test to diagnose Alzheimer's disease -- on the wish list of many doctors, researchers and patients -- may be closer to becoming a reality, according to the results of studies presented virtually this week during the Alzheimer's Association International Conference 2020.

title: Striking photos show a socially distanced Hajj
Trump promotes a doctor who has claimed alien DNA was used in medical treatments
description: President Donald Trump vigorously defended his administration's handling of the coronavirus on Tuesday, but it was a series of questions from CNN's Kaitlan Collins about Dr. Stella Immanuel, a little-known Houston-based physician featured in a video the President retweeted, that caused him to abruptly end his press briefing.

title: A report says China is suspected of hacking the Vatican. Here's why
description: When you think about cyber espionage, the Vatican doesn't come to mind as an obvious target. It's a tiny country whose leader has more moral authority than worldly power.

title: Three Banksy paintings raise $2.9 million at auction for Palestinian hospital
description: Three Banksy paintings have been sold at auction for $2.9 million, with proceeds earmarked for a Palestinian hospital.

title: Critics fear Turkey's new social media law could hurt freedom of expression. Here's how
description: Turkey's parliament passed a bill on Wednesday that regulates social media content in what is being criticized by rights groups as "damaging" to freedom of expression. Here's what it all means.

title: A landmark study shows what makes a successful relationship
description: It's not who you're with, but the dynamic you have with them.

title: Why some Chinese students are faking their own kidnappings
description: Australian police are warning of a new scam targeting Chinese students. They are asked to fake their own kidnappings to force their families to pay ransom money. CNN's Anna Coren reports.

title: Epic 14-year road trip stalled in South America
description: For 14 years, nothing could stop road warriors Karen Catchpole and Eric Mohl. The New York couple with a bad case of wanderlust had rattled in their trusty Silverado from the top of the Western Hemisphere in Alaska to the bottom of South America and a host of places in between on an epic road trip.

title: Rembrandt self-portrait breaks record at virtual auction
description: A self-portrait by Rembrandt sold for $18.7 million at a Sotheby's virtual auction, breaking the record price for a self-portrait by the Dutch master.

title: BBC journalist uses N-word in TV news report
description: Britain's public service broadcaster has come under fire after a news segment featuring an uncensored racial slur was aired on TV.

title: Doctors met with Pence after their group's video was removed
description: Vice President Mike Pence and members of his staff met Tuesday with some of the doctors who were featured in a video that was later removed from social media for misinformation, those doctors said on Wednesday.

title: Permanent WFH sounds great. But it's harder than it sounds
description: The spread of Coronavirus forced many companies to go remote. And some have already pledged to make the work style permanent.

title: Unfortunately for Boris Johnson, much of Europe has moved on from Brexit
UFC President on sports in 2020: 'This isn't going to work outside of a bubble'
description: Dana White is nothing if not steadfast in his belief that he knows exactly what he is doing.

title: Lamborghini's new supercar isn't legal to drive on public roads
Drake breaks Billboard record thanks to DJ Khaled
description: Drake has officially dethroned Madonna thanks to a little help from DJ Khaled.

title: How Toblerone chocolate became connected with air travel
description: Toblerone may not be the most famous chocolate brand in the world, but it's arguably the most iconic -- especially when it comes to travel.

title: More than half of Mumbai slum residents may have had Covid-19, study suggests
description: More than half of residents living in Mumbai's crowded slums may have contracted coronavirus and are likely being infected at a much higher rate than those not living in slum areas, a new study has found.

title: Iran targets replica US aircraft carrier during military drills in Strait of Hormuz
description: Iran's Islamic Revolutionary Guards Corps struck mock targets, including a replica of a US aircraft carrier, on Tuesday night during military drills in the strategic Strait of Hormuz.

title: How Brett Kavanaugh tried to sidestep abortion and Trump financial docs cases
description: Supreme Court Justice Brett Kavanaugh urged his colleagues in a series of private memos this spring to consider avoiding decisions in major disputes over abortion and Democratic subpoenas for President Donald Trump's financial records, according to multiple sources familiar with the inner workings of the court.

title: Kendall Jenner opens the doors to her bohemian LA home
description: Kendall Jenner may hail from one of America's most lavish celebrity families, but her Los Angeles home is more toned-down than you might expect.

title: 'Outright quackery': CNN explains the right-wing media's conspiracy theories
description: CNN's John Avlon reports on the fringe conspiracy theories and misinformation that some conservative media outlets are spreading.

title: Boris Johnson: There are signs of a second coronavirus wave in Europe
description: UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson has warned of a second wave of coronavirus in Europe after the German government followed the UK in advising against travel to Spain.

title: Global air travel won't recover till 2024, says airline body
description: Global air travel won't recover from the Covid-19 crisis until 2024, the International Air Transport Association (IATA) announced Tuesday.

title: Desperation spreads across Bolivia: 'There are no doctors'
description: Bolivia has declared a "state of public calamity" due to the financial impact caused by Covid-19 as cases are on the rise throughout the country. CNN's Stefano Pozzebon reports.

title: Unfortunately for Johnson, much of Europe has moved on from Brexit
description:
• Lawmakers push 'highly toxic' disinfectant as Covid therapy in South American country
• Germany advises against travel to Spain as warnings of second virus wave rise in Europe

title: Trump promoted a doctor. See what she said about demons
description: CNN's Anderson Cooper discusses President Donald Trump's response to the coronavirus and a video he retweeted featuring a group of doctors making false claims about the coronavirus.

title: Premier League star says he's 'scared' to open Instagram due to number of racist messages
description: Premier League star Wilfried Zaha admits he's "scared" to open Instagram due to the number of racist messages he receives.

title: New Zealand mourns death of former All Blacks captain
description: The rugby world is paying tribute to Andy Haden, the former All Blacks captain who passed away on Wednesday aged 69.

title: Trump undermines his own pandemic response
description:
• VIDEO: Watch Trump walk out of briefing after CNN question
• LIVE UPDATES: India's coronavirus cases surpass 1.5 million

title: President Trump walks out of briefing after CNN question
description: President Donald Trump abruptly ended his coronavirus briefing at the White House following a question about his tweets by CNN's Kaitlan Collins. Trump defended the tweets in support of hydroxychloroquine saying that the drug is still "very positive" and called a doctor who was spreading conspiracy theories on Covid-19 in a now deleted video "very impressive."

title: CNN's Chris Cuomo: Trump gave us proof that we were right about him
description: President Trump wondered during a coronavirus press briefing why Dr. Anthony Fauci's approval rating was so high and his was so low. CNN's Chris Cuomo gives his take.

title: See George Floyd hologram light up Confederate monument
description: The foundation created by George Floyd's family launched a new initiative to project a hologram of George Floyd at a handful of Confederate monuments throughout the South.
